## 🎯 Quick Start Commands

::: {.commands-showcase}

```bash
# Download perfect test images
python collage_maker.py --download-samples

# Try the most popular styles
python collage_maker.py --folder sample_images --style mandala    # Sacred geometry
python collage_maker.py --folder sample_images --style mosaic     # Smart layout
python collage_maker.py --folder sample_images --style spiral     # Hypnotic flow
python collage_maker.py --folder sample_images --style hexagon    # Nature's pattern

# Social media ready formats
python collage_maker.py --folder photos --style grid --width 1080 --height 1080     # Instagram
python collage_maker.py --folder photos --style magazine --width 1200 --height 630  # Facebook
python collage_maker.py --folder photos --style mosaic --width 1280 --height 720    # YouTube

# See all available magic
python collage_maker.py --list-styles
```

:::
